Portfolio.name: Training Log
Portfolio.description: A python application made to keep a log of training workouts. Example data will be shown in December 2023.
Portfolio.largeDescription: Made using tkinter GUI and its calendar import. Calendar.py takes data from dates.py, which is the file that contains all the workout data, the displays the data in a calendar for each date that data is available. If data is available then the corresponding date is also marked as green.
